prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered balanced pose with arms extended in harmonious gesture, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline solid head with unique hexagonal prism structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Hexagonal. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal prism, merkaba star, vesica piscis patterns, styled with Archangel marshals influences. Outfit is unique: dark grey with high contrast inspired by Electric and neutral grey inspired by blue angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns fused with divine love sashes and ecstatic dance mantles with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, incorporating spinning-friendly cotton, elaborate with shifting Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and hexagonal prism emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents combined with reed flute with Hexagonal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor GEDOONS's profile: 'He who eliminates your name', Aethyr LOE, Fire element, Tarot The Lovers, Sephirot Hod, Zodiac Gemini, embodying the essence: 'When GEDOONS is near, identities can be erased like chalk names vanish from celestial rolls to grant the bearer tactical invisibility.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered balanced pose with arms extended in harmonious gesture
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline solid head with unique hexagonal prism structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with multi-faceted facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Hexagonal
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal prism, merkaba star, vesica piscis patterns, styled with Archangel marshals influences

outfit.base: angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns fused with divine love sashes and ecstatic dance mantles
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, incorporating spinning-friendly cotton
outfit.details: Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: flickering flame wisps and ember particles

visual_elements.accessory: caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents combined with reed flute
visual_elements.primary_color: dark grey with high contrast inspired by Electric
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who eliminates your name'
profile_data.essence: When GEDOONS is near, identities can be erased like chalk names vanish from celestial rolls to grant the bearer tactical invisibility.
profile_data.angelic_role: Archangel of Veil of Anonymity; marshals thunderous hosts.
profile_data.form_description: A geometrically precise, multi-faceted crystalline form that shifts between transparency and solid fire-essence, representing the dual nature of anonymity and revelation. The crystal structure embodies the Gemini duality of the Lovers card, with interpenetrating triangular forms that suggest both connection and separation.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Electric blue represents the mental clarity of Hod and communicative energy of Gemini, while obsidian black symbolizes the veil of anonymity. The shifting pattern reflects the transformative nature of identity elimination.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structure represents sacred geometry of fire and transformation, Merkaba symbolizes interdimensional travel, while Vesica Piscis represents the liminal space between identities
